allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add missing react-error-boundary dep and clean up for Vercel deploy

- Add react-error-boundary to package.json \(was imported but never installed\)
- Remove .env and test_key.js from tracking \(contain API keys\)
- Add ErrorBoundary, PWAGuide, Config module, and other pending changes
- Update package-lock.json

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent AuthProvider from hanging when Supabase is not configured

Skip auth initialization when Supabase URL/key are missing or placeholder
values, allowing the app to render in offline mode instead of hanging.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
